verses.verse: Now the lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> reached <S%H1961><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Edom, <S%H9000><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> at the extreme <S%H7097><s%> south. <S%H8486><s%>

And their south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> was from the lower end <S%H7097><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> from the bay <S%H3956><s%> that turns <S%H6437><s%> to the south. <S%H5045><s%>

Then it proceeded <S%H3318><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%> to the ascent <S%H4610><s%> of Akrabbim <S%H4610><s%> and continued <S%H5674><s%> to Zin, <S%H6790><s%> then went <S%H5927><s%> up by the south <S%H5045><s%> of Kadesh-barnea and continued <S%H5674><s%> to Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up to Addar <S%H146><s%> and turned <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> to Karka. <S%H7173><s%>

And it continued <S%H5674><s%> to Azmon <S%H6111><s%> and proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall be your south <S%H5045><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

And the east <S%H9506><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> [was] the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the mouth <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> was from the bay <S%H3956><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> at the mouth <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

Then the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Beth-hoglah, and continued <S%H5674><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> of Beth-arabah, and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben. <S%H7205><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Debir <S%H1688><s%> from the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor, <S%H5911><s%> and turned <S%H6437><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is opposite <S%H5227><s%> the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim, <S%H131><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the south <S%H5045><s%> of the valley; <S%H5158><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> continued <S%H5674><s%> to the waters <S%H4325><s%> of En-shemesh, and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at En-rogel.

Then the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Ben-hinnom <S%H2011><s%> to the slope <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> (that is, Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>); and the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom to the west, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is at the end <S%H7097><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> toward the north. <S%H6828><s%>

And from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> curved <S%H9638><s%> to the spring <S%H4599><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah <S%H5318><s%> and proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephron, <S%H6085><s%> then the border <S%H1366><s%> curved <S%H9638><s%> to Baalah <S%H1173><s%> (that is, Kiriath-jearim).

And the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> from Baalah <S%H1173><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and continued <S%H5674><s%> to the slope <S%H3802><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Jearim <S%H3297><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> (that is, Chesalon <S%H3693><s%>), and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Beth-shemesh and continued <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> Timnah. <S%H8553><s%>

And the border <S%H1366><s%> proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward. <S%H6828><s%> Then the border <S%H1366><s%> curved <S%H9638><s%> to Shikkeron <S%H7942><s%> and continued <S%H5674><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Baalah <S%H1173><s%> and proceeded <S%H3318><s%> to Jabneel, <S%H2995><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

And the west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> [was] at the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> even [its] coastline. <S%H1366><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the border <S%H1366><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Now he gave <S%H5414><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> a portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> according <S%H413><s%> to the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> [namely,] Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of Anak <S%H1><s%> (that is, Hebron <S%H6061><s%>).

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> drove <S%H3423><s%> out from there <S%H8033><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak: <S%H6061><s%> Sheshai <S%H8344><s%> and Ahiman <S%H289><s%> and Talmai, <S%H8526><s%> the children <S%H3211><s%> of Anak. <S%H6061><s%>

Then he went <S%H5927><s%> up from there <S%H8033><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir; <S%H1688><s%> now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> was Kiriath-sepher.

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "The one who <S%H834><s%> attacks <S%H5221><s%> Kiriath-sepher and captures <S%H3920><s%> it, I will give <S%H5414><s%> him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> as a wife. <S%H802><s%>"

And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> it; so he gave <S%H5414><s%> him Achsah <S%H5915><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> as a wife. <S%H802><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about that when she came <S%H935><s%> [to him,] she persuaded <S%H5496><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> her father for a field. <S%H1><s%> So she alighted <S%H7704><s%> from the donkey, <S%H6795><s%> and Caleb <S%H2543><s%> said <S%H3612><s%> to her, "What <S%H559><s%> do you want?"

Then she said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> me a blessing; <S%H1293><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you have given <S%H5414><s%> me the land <S%H776><s%> of the Negev, <S%H5045><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>" So he gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the lower <S%H8482><s%> springs. <S%H1543><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> at the extremity <S%H7097><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%> were Kabzeel <S%H6909><s%> and Eder <S%H9387><s%> and Jagur, <S%H3017><s%>
and Kinah <S%H7016><s%> and Dimonah <S%H1776><s%> and Adadah, <S%H5735><s%>
and Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> and Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and Ithnan, <S%H3497><s%>
Ziph <S%H2128><s%> and Telem <S%H2928><s%> and Bealoth, <S%H1175><s%>
and Hazor-hadattah <S%H2674><s%> and Kerioth-hezron (that is, Hazor),
Amam <S%H538><s%> and Shema <S%H8090><s%> and Moladah, <S%H4137><s%>
and Hazar-gaddah and Heshmon <S%H2829><s%> and Beth-pelet,
and Hazar-shual and Beersheba <S%H884><s%> and Biziothiah, <S%H964><s%>
Baalah <S%H1173><s%> and Iim <S%H5864><s%> and Ezem, <S%H6107><s%>
and Eltolad <S%H513><s%> and Chesil <S%H3686><s%> and Hormah, <S%H2767><s%>
and Ziklag <S%H6860><s%> and Madmannah <S%H4089><s%> and Sansannah, <S%H5578><s%>
and Lebaoth <S%H3822><s%> and Shilhim <S%H7978><s%> and Ain <S%H5871><s%> and Rimmon; <S%H9558><s%> in all, <S%H3605><s%> twenty-nine cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
In the lowland: <S%H8219><s%> Eshtaol <S%H847><s%> and Zorah <S%H6881><s%> and Ashnah, <S%H823><s%>
and Zanoah <S%H2182><s%> and En-gannim, Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> and Enam, <S%H9408><s%>
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> and Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> Socoh <S%H7755><s%> and Azekah, <S%H5825><s%>

and Shaaraim <S%H8189><s%> and Adithaim <S%H5723><s%> and Gederah <S%H1449><s%> and Gederothaim; <S%H1453><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Zenan <S%H6799><s%> and Hadashah <S%H2322><s%> and Migdal-gad,
and Dilean <S%H1810><s%> and Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> and Joktheel, <S%H3371><s%>
Lachish <S%H3923><s%> and Bozkath <S%H1218><s%> and Eglon, <S%H5700><s%>
and Cabbon <S%H3522><s%> and Lahmas <S%H3903><s%> and Chitlish, <S%H3798><s%>
and Gederoth, <S%H1450><s%> Beth-dagon and Naamah <S%H9337><s%> and Makkedah; <S%H4719><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Libnah <S%H3841><s%> and Ether <S%H6281><s%> and Ashan, <S%H6228><s%>
and Iphtah <S%H3316><s%> and Ashnah <S%H823><s%> and Nezib, <S%H5334><s%>
and Keilah <S%H7084><s%> and Achzib <S%H392><s%> and Mareshah; <S%H4762><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> with its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H9161><s%>
from Ekron <S%H6138><s%> even to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that were by the side <S%H3027><s%> of Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H9161><s%> Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> its towns <S%H1323><s%> and its villages; <S%H9161><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> even [its] coastline. <S%H1366><s%>
And in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country: <S%H2022><s%> Shamir <S%H8069><s%> and Jattir <S%H3492><s%> and Socoh, <S%H7755><s%>
and Dannah <S%H1837><s%> and Kiriath-sannah (that is, Debir <S%H1688><s%>),
and Anab <S%H6024><s%> and Eshtemoh <S%H851><s%> and Anim, <S%H6044><s%>
and Goshen <S%H1657><s%> and Holon <S%H2473><s%> and Giloh; <S%H1542><s%> eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Arab <S%H694><s%> and Dumah <S%H1746><s%> and Eshan, <S%H824><s%>
and Janum <S%H3241><s%> and Beth-tappuah and Aphekah, <S%H664><s%>
and Humtah <S%H2547><s%> and Kiriath-arba (that is, Hebron <S%H2275><s%>), and Zior; <S%H6730><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Maon, <S%H4584><s%> Carmel <S%H3760><s%> and Ziph <S%H2128><s%> and Juttah, <S%H3194><s%>
and Jezreel <S%H3157><s%> and Jokdeam <S%H3347><s%> and Zanoah, <S%H2182><s%>
Kain, <S%H9515><s%> Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> and Timnah; <S%H8553><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Halhul, <S%H2478><s%> Beth-zur and Gedor, <S%H1446><s%>
and Maarath <S%H4638><s%> and Beth-anoth and Eltekon; <S%H515><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), and Rabbah; <S%H7237><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>
In the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> Beth-arabah, Middin <S%H4081><s%> and Secacah, <S%H5527><s%>
and Nibshan <S%H5044><s%> and the City <S%H5898><s%> of Salt <S%H5898><s%> and Engedi; <S%H5872><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

Now as for the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not drive <S%H3423><s%> them out; so the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
